701483f-a.title: Bronx: Morris Park Avenue - Hunt Avenue
701483f-a.text:
Morris Park Avenue, at the N. W. corner of Hunt Avenue
(right), showing the Yorke Theatre, a movie house.
June 22, 1940
P. L. Sperr
NO REEPRODICTIOSS
701483f-a.folder: Morris Park Avenue & Hunt Avenue, Bronx, NY

701484f-a.title: Bronx: Morris Park Avenue - Hunt Avenue
701484f-a.text:
Morris Park Avenue, at the S. E. corner of Hunt Avenue,
showing the funeral home of Ruggiero and Sons. It was form-
erly the Van Nest Methodist Episcopal Church. The church
occupied a wooden edifice, on the same site, before this
atructure was erected. For the old church see view: Morris
Park Avenue, west from Holland Avenue--1913.
June 22, 1940
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUTIiNS
